summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Saqr App (صقر) - an Instagram-like ad viewing platform. All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend auth, guest mode, advertiser page, and admin dashboard all functional after fixes.
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/App.js - Fixed admin routes to be accessible without user authentication
/app/backend/routes/admin_dashboard_routes.py - Fixed MongoDB _id exclusion in pending ads and withdrawals endpoints
seed_data_creation: Created test advertiser ad during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Email registration/login, Guest mode with real ads from API, Advertiser page with pricing (500 SAR/month), Admin login and dashboard with stats and pending ads management. Google OAuth uses Emergent Auth integration.

auth_page.details: All auth options displayed correctly (Google, Apple, Email, Guest)

guest_mode.details: Guest mode loads real ads from /api/ads

advertiser_page.details: Pricing displayed (500 SAR), form fields present, ad creation works

admin_dashboard.details: Dashboard shows stats, pending ads, pending withdrawals

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Admin login page not accessible without user authentication
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Moved admin routes outside the isAuthenticated check

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Admin dashboard pending ads endpoint returning 500 error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added {'_id': 0} projection to exclude MongoDB _id from query results
